item.title: Solving Classic Sudoku Problems with Z3 Theorem Prover
item.description: Sudoku is a popular logic puzzle that challenges you to fill a 9x9 grid with digits from 1 to 9, such that each row, column and 3x3 subgrid contains each digit exactly once. In this blog post, I will show you how to use Z3, a powerful theorem prover developed by Microsoft Research, to solve classic Sudoku problems in Python.
